meanings.definition: Having a smooth, soft texture like silk.
meanings.sent1: The kitten's fur was the silkiest I had ever felt.
meanings.sent2: She wore the silkiest dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The chef claimed his soup was so silky, it could make you float!
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the silkiest hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The baby's skin was as silky as a rose petal.

meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or excellence.
meanings.sent1: The silkiest chocolate in the box was gone in seconds.
meanings.sent2: Her performance was the silkiest of the entire show.
meanings.sent3: The team's victory was celebrated with the silkiest cake in town.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the silkiest melody she had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The silkiest moment of the evening was when they danced under the stars.
